name: Lost Secrets: Ancient Mysteries - King Tut's Tomb
name_original: Lost Secrets: Ancient Mysteries - King Tut's Tomb
description:
Lost Secrets: Ancient Mysteries - King Tut's Tomb is a game developed by Snow Owl Studio. It was originally released in 2010. GameMill Entertainment published the game.
Lost Secrets: Ancient Mysteries - King Tut's Tomb is available on PC.
